[Lima_camera]
Hamamatsu = hamamatsu.lima.camera

[Lima_tango_camera]
Hamamatsu = hamamatsu.lima.tango

[console_scripts]
hamamatsu-lima = hamamatsu.lima [lima]

[limatb.cli.camera]
Hamamatsu = hamamatsu.lima.cli:hamamatsu [lima]

[limatb.cli.camera.scan]
Hamamatsu = hamamatsu.lima.cli:scan [lima]
